Term.Name: Cinema
Term.Definition: Made originally for viewing in the cinema
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Made on location
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Made in studio
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Made by the consumer

Term.Name: TV
Term.Definition: Made originally for viewing on TV screens
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Made on location
Term.Definition: made at an event in an unstructured environment - where the action is based
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Live
Term.Definition: eg live sporting coverage, Live concerts, Operas etc from theatres
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: As Live
Term.Definition: delayed relay of events - eg olympics frrom different time zone
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Edited
Term.Definition: edited highlights from event such as Match of the Day, NFL highlights
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Made in studio
Term.Definition: made in a puropse built studio or controlled environment such as quiz show from village hall where the action comes to the equipment required to make the programme
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Live
Term.Definition: News, Weather. Lottery etc
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: As Live
Term.Definition: CNN rebroadcasts, Question Time,
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Edited
Term.Definition: Sitcoms, most entertainment shows, Dramas etc
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Made by the consumer
Term.Definition: e.g. home video shared between consumer
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML
